short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick snippets for bolt.new and load xml snippets from bolt.new users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bolt.new Snippets - Chrome Extension

Bolt Snippets is a powerful Chrome extension that accelerates your workflow on bolt.new by making useful code snippets instantly available. With this extension you can:

- Quickly insert code snippets using "/" commands
- Add and manage personal snippets
- Import and export snippets via XML
- Pin and color-code important code sections
- Adjust settings through a user-friendly popup menu

Perfect for developers who regularly use bolt.new and want to optimize their workflow!

Update:
3-12-2024 - Now you can organize the sidebar. Pin your most important projects and give them a color.
